attributes.action: place a tax on exclamation marks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Inappropriate Exclaimers (IEs) are a fundamental contributor to the dumbing down of Great Britain.

By placing a tax on exclamation marks, funds can be directed towards helping such grammatical deviants to develop and grow.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
